channel.title: Certain area where death place is dif and rewards when you pk someone
channel.description: I am making a bounty hunter type place but in my own way. I wanted it where you spawn where there are 3 caves like bounty for lvl 3-40, 40-90 and 90-126. Once you go through the cave, you are teleported to an area in wild somewhere, I want it whenever you kill a person, you get 500k as a reward. Also whenever you die, you get teleported to the place where the 3 caves are. I don't really care if it safe pk zone or not. I just want to know how to make a certain place a different death spot and reward as pk

item.title: Certain area where death place is dif and rewards when you pk someone
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

well for the death place you would need to create something like

Public void Bountydeath ()
Teleportx: x coord
teleporty: y coord

And Then have it there if you die inside the bounty hunter area then:
Public void bountydeath ()

And for the 500K reward, make another void called something like:

public void Bountykill ()
Additem (995, 500000)

Then when you kill some1 inside the bounty area:
public void bountykill ()

Read full topic
item.source: Certain area where death place is dif and rewards when you pk someone
